abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: The aura granted is innate to Beastmaster's hero model. Grants Beastmaster and all of his player-controlled units various talent bonuses.
abilities.details: All auras are provided by independent talents and affects all summons immediately upon learning. Persist Beastmaster's death.

ability_1.name: Wild Axes
ability_1.details: Sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can only affect the same enemy units once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
ability_1.description: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.
technical_details: Both axes spread up to 450-distance away from each other at point target
The axes fly in arcs, the axe from Beastmaster's left hand travels back toward his right hand, and vice versa
Grants a non-lingering 350-radius flying vision as the projectile travels
Trees within the axe radius are destroyed as they travel
interaction_notes: Damage per Axe: 35/65/95/125
Damage Amp per Stack: 6%/8%/10%/12% (8%/10%/12%/14% with talent)
Stack Duration: 12
Max Travel Distance: 1500
Spread Distance: 450

ability_2.name: Call of the Wild Boar
ability_2.details: Calls forth a boar to aid in his battlefield. The Boar's attacks inflict a poison that slows the affected enemy unit's movement speed and attack speed.
ability_2.description: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
interaction_notes: This ability levels up with Call of the Wild Hawk
Recasting the ability does not instant kill the previously summoned Boar

ability_3.name: Call of the Wild Hawk
ability_3.details: Summons a hawk that orbits around Beastmaster. The loyal and unassuming flying companion dies alongside upon Beastmaster's death. The Hawk dive towards the enemy unit, prioritizing heroes, dealing damage and rooting it.
ability_3.description: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
interaction_notes: This ability levels up with Call of the Wild Boar
Hawks do not block neutral creep camps
The dive interval corresponds to the Hawk's current attack speed and base attack time

ability_4.name: Inner Beast
ability_4.details: Untaps the inner fury of himself and grants Beastmaster's player-controlled units within the radius bonus attack speed.
ability_4.description: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.

facet_effects.wild_hunt: Additionally grants attack speed bonus per Beastmaster's player-controlled unit affected by Inner Beast within the radius. Attack Speed Bonus per Unit: 3/4/5/6
facet_effects.beast_mode: Adds an active component to Inner Beast. Self Attack Speed Bonus: 20/30/40/50 (35/45/55/65 with talent), Buff Duration: 6, Cooldown: 20, Mana Cost: 35. Upon tapping into his inner fury, successful attacks now apply Wild Axes debuff of its corresponding level.

interaction_notes: Grants flat bonus attack speed
Affects Beastmaster and units under his control

ability_5.name: Drums of Slom
ability_5.details: Grants an aura that causes successful attacks of Beastmaster and his player-controlled units to strike the drum. The drum strike damages and heals all of his units for a portion of damage dealt within the radius. Every successful attack grants a stack that reduces the drum strike interval.
ability_5.description: Nature's rage is timeless, and for those who know the secrets, it's easy to stir the echoes of ire that rejoiced in the downfall of Slom.
technical_details: Set Stack Count on Primal Roar: 10
interaction_notes: This ability levels up with Primal Roar
Acquiring Aghanim's Scepter unlocks this ability
Grants stacks upon Primal Roar cast regardless if ability effects are applied

ability_6.name: Primal Roar
ability_6.details: Lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to the affected enemy unit. All shoved units are damaged, while applying a dynamic movement speed slow and attack speed slow to these affected enemy units. Grants bonus movement speed to all of his player-controlled units within the radius.
ability_6.description: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.
interaction_notes: This ability levels up with Drums of Slom
Applies a disabling knockback on affected secondary units on the Primal Roar path
The total ability area-of-effect is stadium-shaped
Roshan is innately immune to all forced movement sources

facet_1.name: Arterial Spray
facet_1.effects: Attacks on the Rupture-affected unit now applies a non-disabling forced movement toward the direction Bloodseeker is facing.

effects: Bloodseeker heals for a percentage of all pure damage he deals.
Causes Bloodseeker attacks to deal a percentage of the target's max health as pure damage.
Passively converts all of Bloodseeker's overheal from his abilities into a damage barrier.

level_20: -0.7% Bloodrage Max Health Damage Per Second

abilities.name: Sanguivore
abilities.description: The seeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, and self-heals for the max health of the killed unit, or if Bloodseeker's allies kill a nearby enemy hero. Self-heal is less effective from denying his allies.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Bloodseeker.

ability_1.name: Bloodrage
ability_1.description: Causes the affected unit to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of its health per second.
ability_1.details: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.

ability_2.name: Blood Rite
ability_2.description: The ritual completes after a delay, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
ability_2.details: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.

ability_3.name: Thirst
ability_3.description: Sensing blood of the mortally wounded, Bloodseeker gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below a certain threshold, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. These insatiable bonuses stack per hero.
ability_3.details: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.

ability_4.name: Rupture
ability_4.description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.
ability_4.details: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

facet_1.name: Through and Through
facet_1.effects: The Shuriken Toss projectile damages and slows all units it passes through.

facet_2.name: Cutpurse
facet_2.effects: Steals gold per offensive unit-targeted ability cast, including item abilities and from Spell Reflection sources, on enemy heroes. This ability component levels up with Track.

effects: Applies an instance of Jinada and increases cast range
Grants the Friendly Shadow ability
Applies an invisibility buff based on Shadow Walk of the corresponding level
Has a slightly longer fade time duration for allied heroes
Reduces cooldown

abilities.name: Big Game Hunter
abilities.description: Grants bonus gold to Gondar for kills or assists on an enemy hero with a kill streak.
abilities.details: Hidden Modifier

abilities.name: Cutpurse
abilities.description: Steals gold per offensive unit-targeted ability cast, including item abilities and from Spell Reflection sources, on enemy heroes.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Track. Selecting the Cutpurse facet unlocks this ability.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Gondar's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling, excluding passive innate abilities.
abilities.details: Contains various hidden innate abilities

ability_1.name: Shuriken Toss
ability_1.details: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and slowing the target.
ability_1.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and slowing the target. Gondar's shuriken has the Tracked units in his sight and bounces to any Tracked units within the radius of each other.

facet_effects.through_and_through: The projectile damages and slows all units it passes through with projectile radius of 175

interaction_notes: Can be disjointed by all affected units individually
The projectile stop bouncing upon disjointed
Does not proc Spell Reflection sources on secondary units

ability_2.name: Jinada
ability_2.details: Deals bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold when off-cooldown.
ability_2.description: Deals bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold when off-cooldown. Gondar's vast experience ensures he never walks away from a transaction empty-handed.
interaction_notes: The unreliable gold change component only affects enemy heroes
Considers clones as heroes, illusions and creep-heroes as creeps
Does not affect Buildings or Ward-type units

ability_3.name: Shadow Walk
ability_3.details: Gondar becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability. If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will stun the target for a short duration.
ability_3.description: Gondar becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability. If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will stun the target for a short duration.
interaction_notes: Does not interrupt Gondar's channeling abilities upon cast
Recasting the ability refreshes the buff duration
Does not break invisibility on missed attacks or item interactions

ability_4.name: Friendly Shadow
ability_4.details: Applies an invisibility buff based on Shadow Walk of the corresponding level. Has a slightly longer fade time duration for allied heroes.
ability_4.description: Applies an invisibility buff based on Shadow Walk of the corresponding level. Has a slightly longer fade time duration for allied heroes. Friendly Shadow does not break Gondar's Shadow Walk upon cast.
interaction_notes: Acquiring Aghanim's Shard unlocks this ability
This ability levels up with Shadow Walk
Does not need to turn to cast this ability within its cast range

ability_5.name: Track
ability_5.details: Grants True Sight, applies an incoming damage amplification debuff, and information on how much gold the affected enemy unit is carrying. If the Tracked enemy unit dies, Gondar collects a bonus gold bounty. Track does not break Gondar's Shadow Walk upon cast.
ability_5.description: Grants True Sight, applies an incoming damage amplification debuff, and information on how much gold the affected enemy unit is carrying. If the Tracked enemy unit dies, Gondar collects a bonus gold bounty.
interaction_notes: Does not break Shadow Walk's invisibility upon cast
All ability effects are applied immediately on the unit-targeted enemy
Grants unreliable gold upon the Tracked enemy hero's death within the radius

facet_1.name: Roll Out the Barrel
facet_1.effects: Cinder Brew is now a point-targeted ability, and rolls the whole barrel toward the direction upon cast, damaging and debuffing enemies that it collides with on its way. Upon reaching the impact location, the barrel explodes, drenching enemy units within the radius in brew.

facet_2.name: Drunken Master
facet_2.effects: Moves with a varying amount of movement speed, alternating between moving slower and faster when the Drunken Master is Brewed Up! -15% Move Speed, +50% Move Speed

effects: Grants the Primal Companion ability
Summons a permanent companion corresponding of the current Drunken Brawler element, and of Primal Split's corresponding level
Grants the Primal Split Cancel ability
The fragments grants Brewmaster the ability to reunite all spiritual schisms back to one
Ends Primal Split immediately, Brewmaster reappears based on the Primal Split Brewlings priority
Increases duration

level_25: Cinder Brew Applies Fear Upon Proc

abilities.name: Belligerent
abilities.description: Grants bonus attack damage for a period of time upon respawning.
abilities.details: Grants bonus attack damage for a shorter period of time upon reassembling himself from Primal Split.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Brewmaster's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling, excluding passive innate abilities.
abilities.details: Contains various hidden innate abilities that can be tapped for more details.

ability_1.name: Thunder Clap
ability_1.details: Slams the ground, dealing damage and applies a movement speed slow and attack speed slow within the radius.
ability_1.description: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.
technical_details: Reapplying the debuff neither updates the movement speed slow nor attack speed slow values, but refreshes the duration
The current instance must expire to update the ability slow values
interaction_notes: Effect Radius: 325/350/375/400
Move Speed Slow: 15%/30%/45%/60%
Attack Speed Slow: 15/30/45/60
Duration: 4 (5.5 with talent)

ability_2.name: Cinder Brew
ability_2.details: Drenches himself and an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignited once they take any spell damage.
ability_2.description: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!
interaction_notes: Cinder Brew Factor: 2.5 (3.5 with talent)
The Drunken Brawler stances are stronger when the drunken master is Brewed Up!

ability_3.name: Drunken Brawler
ability_3.details: Switches stance based on the element the Brewmaster controls, granting bonuses and adapting to the battlefield.
ability_3.description: When Mangix won his title as the Brewmaster of the Order of Oyo, he also claimed his place in the mastery of inebriation.
technical_details: All ability effects are exaggerated two-folds or possibly more while being affected by Cinder Brew
This ability levels up with Primal Companion
interaction_notes: Interrupts Brewmaster's channeling abilities upon toggling between stances
Switch stances: Earth Stance → Storm Stance → Fire Stance → Void Stance → Earth Stance

ability_4.name: Primal Companion
ability_4.details: Summons a permanent companion corresponding of the current Drunken Brawler element, and of Primal Split's corresponding level.
ability_4.description: Mangix doesn't hold to it by rule, but he vaguely recalls an old master musing that, if one could manage, scaring up a companion was always preferable to drinking alone.
technical_details: This ability cannot be acquired by the Grand Magus by design
The primal companion cannot be resummoned if the current summon receive damage from player-controlled units
interaction_notes: Sub-ability of Primal Split
This ability levels up with Drunken Brawler
Acquiring Aghanim's Scepter unlocks this ability

ability_5.name: Primal Split
ability_5.details: Splits Brewmaster into elements of nature, forming various specialized Brewling warriors, each with their own abilities. If any of them survives until the end of its summoned timer, the Brewmaster reborns.
ability_5.description: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.
technical_details: The Brewlings are unable to activate runes, but they can attack and destroy them
interaction_notes: This ability levels up with Primal Companion
Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade: Resets Primal Companion's cooldown and instant kills the current Brewling companion
Aghanim's Shard Upgrade: Increases duration
Talent Upgrade: Grants certain stat bonuses tailored for the elements

facet_1.name: Snot Rocket
facet_1.effects: Viscous Nasal Goo has a higher stack limit, and applies a higher bonus armor reduction per stack. If Bristleback takes up to a certain amount of damage from the rear, he releases a Viscous Nasal Goo of its corresponding level within the radius. +2 Max Stacks, -1 Armor per Stack

facet_2.name: Seeing Red
facet_2.effects: Adds an active component to Warpath. Reduces self vision to an angled-cone while active, and applies an attack damage factor and movement speed factor to the current stacks.

effects: Bristleback rotates towards the targeted direction. After a short delay, he forcefully release a number of Quill Sprays in a tight conical pattern out of his back between intervals.
Grants the Hairball ability.
Coughs a quill-packed hairball toward and erupts at the point-targeted location.

level_15: +8% Bristleback Back Damage Reduction +4% Bristleback Side Damage Reduction

abilities.name: Prickly
abilities.description: Grants both outgoing damage amplification and debuff duration amplification against enemy units behind Bristleback.
abilities.details: Grants percentage-based outgoing damage amplification. Applies to offensively-applied debuffs sourced to Rigwarl.

ability_1.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
ability_1.details: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed. Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.
ability_1.description: Having caught a cold while stuck in the snow, Bristleback turns it to his advantage.
interaction_notes: Considers creep-heroes as heroes
Grants Warpath stack upon ability cast and does not rely on the projectile impact

ability_2.name: Quill Spray
ability_2.details: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback. Deals additional bonus damage per current stack on the debuff-affected enemy unit.
ability_2.description: An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing. So can his quills.
interaction_notes: Grants 1 Warpath stack upon cast or when autocast
Interrupts Rigwarl's channeling abilities upon cast
Now automatically spray quills whenever possible when activated

ability_3.name: Bristleback
ability_3.details: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.
ability_3.description: Turning his back to a fight might be just the thing.
interaction_notes: If Bristleback takes up to a certain amount of damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray
Works independently of the passively released ability's cooldown
Does not proc on-cast effects

ability_4.name: Hairball
ability_4.details: Coughs a quill-packed hairball toward and erupts at the point-targeted location.
ability_4.description: Every part of Bristleback's body is a weapon — even the parts he accidentally swallowed.
interaction_notes: Acquiring Aghanim's Shard unlocks this ability
Quill Spray travels faster than Viscous Nasal Goo
Grants 1 Warpath stack upon cast

ability_5.name: Warpath
ability_5.details: Grants self flat bonus attack damage and bonus movement speed every time Bristleback casts a spell.
ability_5.description: 'Temper, temper,' his mum always chided. But in a fight, a temper can come in handy.
technical_details: Attack Damage Bonus per Stack: 15/20/25 (33/38/43 with talent)
interaction_notes: Grants flat bonus attack damage
Each stack grants a new buff with independent duration
Does not proc on item abilities or 0-second cooldown sources

facet_1.name: Necrotic Webs
facet_1.effects: Reduces the values of health restoration sources of all affected enemy units within the same Spin Web radius as Broodmother.

facet_2.name: Feeding Frenzy
facet_2.effects: Insatiable Hunger now creates an aura that applies the buff of its corresponding level and values to Broodmother and all Spiderlings within the radius.

effects: Grants the Spinner's Snare ability
Creates invisible web-snares next to any current webs that acts as a trap
Arachnia may globally weave a snare-web trap in the area-targeted location centered next an existing Spin Web radius
Grants a flat base attack damage increment per second
Increases duration

level_10: +1.5% Spider's Milk Enemy Max Health as Heal

abilities.name: Spider's Milk
abilities.description: Grants a lifesteal-based heal over time buff per enemy hero killed within the radius to Broodmother and her player-controlled units.
abilities.details: The lifesteal-based heal over time is less effective on creeps. The applied lifesteal-based heal is less effective from deny sources. Only denies from Broodmother may proc the heal component.

ability_1.name: Insatiable Hunger
ability_1.description: Grants base attack damage bonus lifesteal.

facet_effects.feeding_frenzy: Creates an aura that applies the buff to Broodmother and all Spiderlings within 800 radius

technical_details: Lifesteal is less effective when attacking creeps (0.6 factor)
interaction_notes: Stacks additively with other lifesteal sources
Cannot lifesteal off allied units or ward-type units

ability_2.name: Spin Web
ability_2.description: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a bonus movement speed and bonus health regeneration within its radius. Her webs do not expire until the max amount of webs are reached, destroying the oldest spun web.

facet_effects.necrotic_webs: Reduces health restoration sources of enemy units within web radius by 10%/30%/50%/70%

interaction_notes: Only affects Broodmother and her Spiderlings
Grants phase movement and unobstructed movement
Does not affect units in enemy fountain area

ability_3.name: Incapacitating Bite
ability_3.description: Cripples with her attacks. Applies a movement speed slow and the affected units have a chance to miss their attacks.
interaction_notes: Uses pseudo-random distribution for blind
Stacks additively with other blind sources
Does not interact with allied units or buildings

ability_4.name: Spawn Spiderlings
ability_4.description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit and dealing damage. Upon the affected unit's death, her babies mature, hatching young Spiderlings to aid her in the battlefield.
interaction_notes: Multiple debuff instances work independently
Spiderlings are created upon affected unit's death
Only affects Broodmother's Spiderlings with web bonuses

ability_5.name: Spinner's Snare
ability_5.description: Creates invisible web-snares next to any current webs that acts as a trap. The snares have an activation delay.
interaction_notes: Requires Aghanim's Scepter to unlock
Enemy heroes crossing the web spring the trap
Multiple heroes can trip the same snare
Provides minimap alert when triggered

facet_1.name: Counter-Strike
facet_1.effects: Double Edge deals additional damage equal to a percentage of the incoming damage taken previously. The damage counter resets upon cast.

facet_2.name: Horsepower
facet_2.effects: Grants flat bonus movement speed per current strength and increases the self max movement speed cap.

effects: Grants the Work Horse ability
Centaur hitches a cart behind him and can cast Hitch A Ride on an ally
Deals a non-lethal magical self-damage to Centaur
Grants self strength bonus stacks per hero hit for a short time, and the duration refreshes per stack

abilities.name: Rawhide
abilities.description: Grants a stack of permanent health bonus as the game goes on.
abilities.details: The stack grant duration starts at 0:00 game-time. Does not affect the current health percentage upon the passive max health increase.

abilities.name: Horsepower
abilities.description: Grants flat bonus movement speed per current strength and increases the self max movement speed cap.
abilities.details: Selecting the Horsepower facet unlocks this ability. Requires having 81 strength to reach the max movement speed.

ability_1.name: Hoof Stomp
ability_1.details: After a brief windup, Centaur slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units. Centaur can move and is not disarmed during the delay.
ability_1.description: After a brief windup, Centaur slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.
interaction_notes: During the wind-up, the ability can be canceled under certain conditions

ability_2.name: Double Edge
ability_2.details: Strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on Centaur's strength.
ability_2.description: Strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on Centaur's strength.
interaction_notes: Cannot self-deny
Shard upgrade grants strength bonus stacks per hero hit

ability_3.name: Retaliate
ability_3.details: Counters all attacks, and returns a fixed damage amount plus a percentage based on Centaur's strength.
ability_3.description: Counters all attacks, and returns a fixed damage amount plus a percentage based on Centaur's strength.
technical_details: Enemy Str to Bonus Damage Factor: 0.16/0.24/0.32/0.4
interaction_notes: Talent upgrade grants aura to allied heroes within radius
Damage instance applied is still sourced to Centaur

ability_4.name: Stampede
ability_4.details: Centaur leads all allied units into a vicious charge, causing them to move through units at max speed while trampling enemy units.
ability_4.description: Centaur leads all allied units into a vicious charge, causing them to move through units at max speed while trampling enemy units.
interaction_notes: Grants haste movement, phase movement, and unobstructed movement to allied units
Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur's strength

facet_1.name: Irrationality
facet_1.effects: Reality Rift has an equal random chance to either apply Break, or Disarm, or Silence on the affected enemy unit. The debuff duration is a portion of the armor reduction duration.

facet_2.name: Fundamental Forging
facet_2.effects: When Chaos Knight crafts a neutral item, 2 of his Artifact choices will be for the current tier and 2 of his choices will be for the next tier (if possible). He is not able to keep his current Artifact between tiers.

facet_3.name: Cloven Chaos
facet_3.effects: Chaos Bolt splits in half on impact, stunning one additional enemy unit and damaging another. Prioritizes heroes.

effects: Globally creates an illusion of each allied heroes, this also creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.
Creates a weaker Phantasm-based illusion to attack the affected enemy unit upon the projectile impact.

abilities.name: Reins of Chaos
abilities.description: Chaos Knight has a chance to create an additional illusion per illusion-creating source.
abilities.details: Both offensive and defensive illusion-creating sources now create 1 additional Chaos Knight-based illusion upon proc, following the illusion source's base illusion stats.

abilities.name: Fundamental Forging
abilities.description: When Chaos Knight crafts a neutral item, 2 of his Artifact choices will be for the current tier and 2 of his choices will be for the next tier (if possible). He is not able to keep his current Artifact between tiers.
abilities.details: Selecting the Fundamental Forging facet unlocks this ability.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Chaos Knight's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling, excluding passive innate abilities.
abilities.details: Contains various hidden innate abilities that can be tapped for more details.

ability_1.name: Chaos Bolt
ability_1.details: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit that stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
ability_1.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit that stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

facet_effects.cloven_chaos: Chaos Bolt splits in half on impact, stunning one additional enemy unit and damaging another. Prioritizes heroes.

technical_details: The stun and magical spell damage values applied are inversely related — the higher the damage, the shorter the stun, and vice versa.
The stun duration applied is a random value between the min and max duration.
Has a 700-projectile speed and can travel up to a max 0.86 seconds.
interaction_notes: All Chaos Knight's illusions casts a fake Chaos Bolt within a certain distance of the affected enemy unit.
Creates a Phantasm-based illusion upon projectile impact with Aghanim's Shard.

ability_2.name: Reality Rift
ability_2.details: Teleports Chaos Knight and all illusions he has and the targeted unit to a point along the line between both of them. Applies armor reduction to the affected enemy unit.
ability_2.description: Teleports Chaos Knight and all illusions he has and the targeted unit to a point along the line between both of them. Applies armor reduction to the affected enemy unit.

facet_effects.irrationality: Reality Rift has an equal random chance to either apply Break, or Disarm, or Silence on the affected enemy unit. The debuff duration is a portion of the armor reduction duration.

technical_details: Neither disjoints incoming projectiles for Chaos Knight nor for the affected enemy.
The final teleport location for both Chaos Knight and the unit-targeted enemy is determined upon the ability's cast point.
All Chaos Knight's illusions are teleported from random angles within the search radius.
interaction_notes: Roshan is innately immune to the offensive teleport component.
Talent upgrade allows piercing spell immunity.

ability_3.name: Chaos Strike
ability_3.details: Chaos Knight and his illusions' attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength, in addition to a lifesteal for the percentage of the damage.
ability_3.description: Chaos Knight and his illusions' attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength, in addition to a lifesteal for the percentage of the damage.
technical_details: The proc is determined during Chaos Knight's attack point.
Grants the critical strike procs lifesteal as well.
interaction_notes: Lifesteal is less effective when attacking creeps.
Does not proc on allied units, buildings, or ward-type units.

ability_4.name: Phantasm
ability_4.details: Summons several phantasm copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions.
ability_4.description: Summons several phantasm copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions.
technical_details: Chaos Knight is hidden upon cast; this disjoints incoming projectiles.
Applies a basic dispel on Chaos Knight.
interaction_notes: The phantasms are illusions that deals as much damage as Chaos Knight and receives additional incoming damage.
Aghanim's Scepter globally creates an illusion of each allied heroes.

facet_1.name: Centaur Convert
facet_1.effects: Summon Convert calls forth either a Centaur Courser or Centaur Conqueror.

facet_2.name: Hellbear Convert
facet_2.effects: Summon Convert calls forth either a Hellbear or Hellbear Smasher.

facet_3.name: Troll Convert
facet_3.effects: Summon Convert calls forth either a Hill Troll or Dark Troll Summoner.

facet_4.name: Satyr Convert
facet_4.effects: Summon Convert calls forth either a Satyr Mindstealer or Satyr Tormenter.

facet_5.name: Marshmage Convert
facet_5.effects: Summon Convert calls forth either a Marshmage Apprentice or Marshmage.

effects: Grants the Martyrdom ability
Enables persuading ancient creeps per level of Hand of God
Increases the level of certain persuaded creeps' abilities

level_25: Hand of God Full Health Restore for Chen and all Player-controlled Units

abilities.name: Summon Convert
abilities.description: Summons a creep-hero convert to fight alongside Chen corresponding to the selected Facet.
abilities.details: Grants the convert all bonuses of Holy Persuasion's corresponding level, except health values. The Convert is considered one of Chen's Persuaded units, and dies upon Chen's death.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Chen's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Contains hidden innate abilities that require channeling to activate.

ability_1.name: Penitence
ability_1.details: Applies a movement speed slow debuff on the affected enemy unit.
ability_1.description: Applies a movement speed slow debuff on the affected enemy unit. Grants bonus attack speed to the allied unit attacking the affected enemy unit. Grants Chen and his player-controlled units bonus attack speed and bonus attack range on the affected enemy unit.
technical_details: Grants bonus attack range of the same range-type as the caster

ability_4.description: Effect Delay: 2.7182, Crack Width: 315, Crack Distance: 2100, Max Health as Magical Damage: 15%/20%/25%, Max Health as Physical Damage: 15%/20%/25%, Move Speed Slow: 30%/40%/50%, Slow Duration: 3/4/5

Teleports all affected units to the crack's centerpoint upon implosion
interaction_notes: The implosion applies movement speed slow, deals half magical and half physical damage corresponding to the affected enemy units' max health
Does not affect ancient creeps

abilities.description: The Ember Spirit immolates and deals damage per second within the radius centered around itself.

ability_1.details: Search Radius: 400, Max Targets: 2, Damage per Second: 50/70/90/110, Duration: 1.5/2/2.5/3

interaction_notes: True Sight component affects debuff immune units

technical_details: Grants invulnerability and unselectable during dash
Self-disarms until all targets are attacked
Positions 50 distance away from marked units
interaction_notes: Can be interrupted by Activate Fire Remnant or death
Procs attack modifiers and on-cast effects

ability_3.description: Surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, absorbing a percentage of the damage taken.
technical_details: Applies damage per second in 0.2-second intervals
Barrier depletes after taking specific amount of magical damage
interaction_notes: Recasting refreshes duration and barrier value
Does not proc on-damage effects until barrier is depleted

ability_4.name: Fire Remnant

ability_4.description: Sends a Fire Remnant that dashes to the target location.

facet_effects.chain_gang: Searing Chains are also additionally applied around all current Fire Remnants upon cast

Can cast instantly while traveling with Activate Fire Remnant
interaction_notes: Shard: Restores charge on enemy hero death within radius
Shard: Leaves remnant on death
Shard: Remnants apply Immolation

facet_1.name: Overprotective Wisps
facet_1.effects: These overprotective Nature's Attendants of its corresponding level appear and heal Enchantress whenever she takes up to a certain amount of damage.

facet_2.name: Spellbound
facet_2.effects: Grants Enchantress and her player-controlled units bonus attack range when attacking the Enchanted enemy hero. Increases cast range. +50/100/150/200 Cast Range

effects: Grants the Little Friends ability
Roots an enemy unit. Enchantress orders creeps of all factions, including neutral creeps, within the radius to attack the affected enemy unit
Increases the max enchanted creep count
Grants the Sproink ability
Leaps backward and disjoints incoming projectiles
Enchantress launches Impetus of its corresponding level on a number of furthest enemy units

level_20: +150/+25 Health/Attack Damage to Enchantress and Her Units
level_15: +30 Attack Speed to Enchantress and Her Units

abilities.name: Rabble-Rouser
abilities.description: All neutral creeps conditionally deals more damage to enemy heroes.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Enchantress.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Enchantress' talent granted auras are not affected by Break sources.
abilities.details: Grants Enchantress and all of her player-controlled units various talent bonuses.

ability_1.name: Impetus
ability_1.details: Enchants her own attack while activated, causing it to deal additional distance-based damage between Enchantress and the enemy target. The farther the target, the greater the damage.
ability_1.description: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.
interaction_notes: Impetus is more effective on illusions
Uses Enchantress's current attack range for both Autocast and active cast

ability_2.name: Enchant
ability_2.details: Charms an enemy hero and slowing its movement speed in the process. If the targeted unit is an enemy or a neutral creep, Enchantress brings it under her control and receives a portion of their experience bounty.
ability_2.description: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it — from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.
interaction_notes: Enchanted creeps are summoned units, their attacks are less effective on Reinforced units
Damage Factor: 0.6

ability_3.name: Nature's Attendants
ability_3.details: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and allied units nearby.
ability_3.description: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.
technical_details: Heal per Second per Wisp: 4/8/12/16 (12/16/20/24 with talent)
interaction_notes: Each wisp chooses a random allied unit in 0.5-second intervals
Multiple wisps can affect the same unit at the same time

ability_4.name: Sproink
ability_4.details: Leaps backward and disjoints incoming projectiles. Enchantress launches Impetus of its corresponding level on a number of furthest enemy units.
ability_4.description: Sproink is as Sproink does.
interaction_notes: Requires Aghanim's Shard to unlock
Interrupts channeling abilities upon cast
Disjoints projectiles upon cast

ability_5.name: Little Friends
ability_5.details: Roots an enemy unit. Enchantress orders creeps of all factions, including neutral creeps, within the radius to attack the affected enemy unit.
ability_5.description: The laws of the forest may be oblique, but punishment for breaking them is swift and smiling.
interaction_notes: Requires Aghanim's Scepter to unlock
Creeps are taunted by the affected enemy unit
Grants True Sight over the affected enemy unit

ability_6.name: Untouchable
ability_6.details: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
ability_6.description: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
interaction_notes: Procs on the enemy unit's attack point when attacking Enchantress
The slow duration is defined as the unit's attack backswing

facet_1.name: Event Horizon
facet_1.effects: Applies a movement speed slow to enemy units not facing Enigma within the radius.

facet_2.name: Splitting Image
facet_2.effects: If Enigma takes up to a certain amount of damage, a Demonic Summoning of its corresponding level will fracture from himself.

effects: Causes the outer radius of the vortex to now pull in enemy units, but does not disable them.
Black Hole additionally deals the affected enemy's max health as damage per second within the inner radius.
Creates a Lesser Eidolon of the current Demonic Summoning's level per Malefice stun instance.
The Eidolons created this way do not multiply further.
Increases stun duration.

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.description: Grants incoming damage reduction bonus to allied units within the radius. The effect lessens with distance from Enigma.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Black Hole. Does not affect self. Grants 0.3%/0.4%/0.4%/0.5% incoming damage reduction per 10-distance proximity between Enigma and allied units within the radius.

abilities.name: Event Horizon
abilities.description: Applies a movement speed slow to enemy units not facing Enigma within the radius.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Black Hole. Selecting the Event Horizon facet unlocks this ability. The aura does not linger and clears once the affected unit faces away from Enigma.

ability_1.name: Malefice
ability_1.description: Focus his will on an enemy unit, damaging it and repeatedly stuns it.
ability_1.details: Number of Instances: 3 (7 with Shard), Instance Interval: 2, Damage per Instance: 55/70/85/100 (105/120/135/150 with Shard), Stun Duration per Instance: 0.3/0.5/0.7/0.9 (0.6/0.8/1/1.2 with Shard), Malefice Duration: 4 (12 with Shard)
technical_details: The first instance procs upon cast, subsequent instances proc per 2 seconds.
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration and continues applying damage in the same intervals as the first cast.
interaction_notes: Creates a Lesser Eidolon corresponding of Enigma's Demonic Summoning level per stun instance applied with Shard.
Issues an attack order for the created Eidolons on the unit-targeted enemy.

ability_2.name: Demonic Summoning
ability_2.description: Summons fragments of the Enigma himself.
ability_2.details: Number of Eidolons: 3 (7 with Talent), Duration: 40, Current Health as Max Health Bonus: 300%, Nth Attack to Multiply: 7, Set Current Health: 100%, Number of Copies: 1, Duration Increase: 2
technical_details: The current health cost utilizes setting health and is non-lethal.
The created Eidolon has health defined as: Unit Max HP = 180/200/220/240 + ⌊ EnigmaCurrent HP × 0.03 ⌋
The first batch of Eidolons created via a Demonic Summoning cast multiplies at its 7th attack attempt after accumulating 6 valid attacks.

ability_3.name: Midnight Pulse
ability_3.description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their current health.
ability_3.details: Effect Radius: 600 (800 with Talent), Damage per Second: 5/10/15/20, Current Health as Damage per Second: 4%/6%/8%/10%, Duration: 9/10/11/12, Aura Linger Duration: 0.5
technical_details: Creates a negative aura at the area-targeted location and deals 2.5/5/7.5/10 + 2%/3%/4%/5% current health to affected enemy units in 0.5-second intervals.
Does not affect Ancient creeps and Ward-type units.
Multiple overlapping Midnight Pulse radius do not stack.

ability_4.name: Black Hole
ability_4.description: Summons a vortex that pulls in and disables enemy units within the radius.
ability_4.details: Max Channel Time: 4, Inner Effect Radius: 420, Inner Pull Speed: 30, Damage per Second: 100/150/200 (150/200/250 with Scepter), Max Silence Duration: 4, Aura Linger Duration: 0.5, Max Health as Damage per Second: 4% (with Scepter)
technical_details: Creates two negative auras that lasts as long as the channeling duration at the area-targeted location.
The inner radius applies disabling forced movement that pulls affected units to the center.
Applies Leash, Silence, and Stun to affected units within inner radius.
With Scepter: Outer Effect Radius: 1200, Outer Pull Speed: 175
interaction_notes: Affected units within inner radius can be pulled out by various sources, except Force Staff-based items, Geomagnetic Grip, Dispose, and Snowball.
Spirals affected enemy units anticlockwise while channeling at 14.32° per second.

facet_1.name: Chronosphere
facet_1.effects: Chronosphere is Faceless Void's ultimate ability with the selected facet. Trap all units caught within the radius and causes Faceless Void to move very quickly inside it. Reveals invisible enemies within the sphere.

facet_2.name: Time Zone

effects: Applies Time Lock of the corresponding level onto all units at the landing destination

Increases max travel distance

level_20: +100 Chronosphere / Time Zone Self Attack Speed
level_15: +12% Time Dilation Move Speed Slow / +12 Time Dilation Attack Speed Slow

abilities.name: Distortion Field
abilities.description: Applies an attack projectile speed factor on offensive and incoming enemy attack projectiles within the radius, centered around the time master. Affects projectiles even if Faceless Void isn't the attacked target.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Chronosphere. Does not affect spell damage-based projectiles. Stacks additively with other attack projectile speed factor sources.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Other Bash sources are passively disabled on Faceless Void. Darkterror brings all but himself and his likeness to a complete standstill within the Chronosphere. Darkterror reigns within spacetime. Him and his likeness are immune to the Time Zone effects.
abilities.details: Bash sources are innately disabled for Faceless Void, even when Time Lock is not learned. Faceless Void and all illusions based on him are innately immune to Chronosphere's disable and Time Zone's negative ability effects.

abilities.name: Backtrack
abilities.description: The time manipulator has a chance to avoid damage entirely.
abilities.details: Learning the Level 25 talent unlocks this ability. Fully negates damage after all reductions, causing on-damage effects to not trigger. Uses pseudo-random distribution. Increases Faceless Void's effective health on an average of 25% against all damage types.

ability_1.name: Time Walk
ability_1.details: Rushes to a target location while healing up from any damage taken in the last few seconds.
ability_1.description: Rushes to a target location while healing up from any damage taken in the last few seconds.

interaction_notes: Does not accumulate HP Removal sources
Time Lock applied via Scepter cannot proc more than once
Affects Ethereal units, Fogged units, Hidden units

Reapplying the debuff applies a new independent stack debuff

ability_3.description: Adds a chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.
interaction_notes: 0.4 seconds upon proc, the magical spell damage is applied and Faceless Void instant attacks the affected enemy unit
Does not affect Buildings, Ward-type units

Death does not prevent the proccing attack from applying Time Lock

ability_4.name: Chronosphere
ability_4.details: Trap all units caught within the radius and causes Faceless Void to move very quickly inside it. Reveals invisible enemies within the sphere.

interaction_notes: Freezes all units which are not owned by Faceless Void
Applies Leash and Stun effects

Does not affect Hidden units, Invulnerable heroes

facet_1.name: Inkstigate
facet_1.effects: Increases Ink Swell's duration by +1s. Grants the Ink Explosion sub-ability to trigger an existing Ink Swell anytime as the ink master wishes.

abilities.details: Stroke of Fate also applies the trail to affected enemy heroes. Exposes the affected enemy unit's hero model upon successful attack or Stroke of Fate projectile impact.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Grimstroke's hero model has hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Grimstroke is considered a ground unit, despite its hero model showing otherwise. Dark Portrait is innately bound to Grimstroke's hero model with Aghanim's Scepter.

ability_1.name: Stroke of Fate
ability_1.details: Paints a path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits.
ability_1.description: The corruptive force of Grimstroke's ink, drawn from the reservoir of his fallen people, consumes any enemy caught in its path.

facet_effects.fine_art: Adds vector-targeting functionality with increased damage increment per enemy hit: 20/40/60/80. Vector Curve Radius: 140.

interaction_notes: Stroke of Fate also applies the Ink Trail to affected enemy heroes, exposing them in the process

ability_2.name: Phantom's Embrace
ability_2.details: Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the unit-targeted enemy. Once the phantom latches on the unit, she deals damage over time while silencing it.
ability_2.description: Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.
interaction_notes: If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes this ability's cooldown
Creeps' attacks are less effective on Yaovhi

ability_3.name: Ink Swell

ability_3.description: Now that the rise of the ink tide no longer threatens to overwhelm Grimstroke, its tendrils of power are never far from his hand.

facet_effects.inkstigate: Increases Ink Swell's duration to 4 seconds. Grants Ink Explosion sub-ability.

interaction_notes: After swelling up for a period of time, the ink explodes, applying damage and stun within the radius proportion to the duration the tendril was near any enemy hero
Has a different cast backswing when self-casting the ability

ability_4.name: Dark Portrait
ability_4.details: Masterfully creates an illusion of the affected enemy hero.
ability_4.description: No dark creation is beyond the skill of the master's hand.
interaction_notes: The ink illusion is a strong illusion, has bonus movement speed, deals additional damage based on the affected enemy's main attack damage and receives additional incoming damage
This illusion is debuff immune and has high magic resistance

ability_5.name: Soulbind
ability_5.details: Bound an enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the radius, preventing both affected enemy units from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero received is instantly cast on the other.
ability_5.description: The Ascended were chosen sons of Ashkavor, granted immense power by the bonds forged between their own souls and those they were charged with protecting. In the years that followed the ruination of his kin, Grimstroke discovered much more sinister applications for the binding rituals...
interaction_notes: If the bonds are broken before the debuff duration expires, the debuff remains on the primary target, and binds itself to the next nearest allied hero

facet_1.name: Secondary Strikes
facet_1.effects: Reduces strike interval by 0.2. Adds a secondary strike component to the missiles. If an enemy hero gets hit, a tracking missile is passively called on that specific enemy hero, reapplying all Call Down ability effects again with 0.5x Secondary Damage Factor.

facet_2.name: Afterburner
facet_2.effects: Grants self movement speed bonus per Rocket hit on enemy heroes.

effects: Adds a Side Gunner that passively attacks random enemy units, prioritizing the furthest unit away from Gyrocopter

ability_1.description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.

effects: Grants the Decoy ability

level_20: Sharpshooter Grants Vision and True Sight During Wind-up

effects: Applies a basic dispel on Marci upon cast

abilities.name: Special Delivery
abilities.description: Marci whistles and instantly teleports her Courier to her. Her faction starts the game with more robust Flying Couriers.
abilities.details: Professional courtesy, from one courier to another.

ability_1.name: Dispose
ability_1.details: Grabs the unit-targeted ally or enemy unit and throws it effortlessly behind her, damaging and slowing the unit if it's an enemy. Additionally damages and applies a movement speed slow to all enemy units within the landing radius.
ability_1.description: Marci excels at removing obstacles from Princess Mirana's path.
technical_details: Can Dispose units up to 230° of a circular segment in front of Marci's facing angle without turning
Landing distance varies correspondingly to the unit's previous location upon cast
Can land at max 250-distance from point behind Marci
interaction_notes: Both Roshan and the Tormentor are immune to forced movement sources
All ability effects are applied immediately at their current position

ability_2.name: Rebound
ability_2.details: Marci bounds to the targeted unit, choosing a direction and distance she will spring away from it. Grants the targeted ally a short duration movement speed bonus. Upon reaching the unit, Marci leaps to her final destination, damaging and stunning enemies in the area.
ability_2.description: With a friendly or brazen boost, Marci can find her way into the midst of any fight.

facet_effects.fleeting_fury: Upon landing with Rebound, Marci gains a short Unleashed Fury combo
facet_effects.pick_me_up: Enables Rebound Alt-Cast functionality. Marci carries the unit-targeted ally with her to the landing radius after the leap component

technical_details: Can move over impassable terrain and over trees
interaction_notes: Cannot be cast on Buildings, Couriers, Invulnerable units, or Ward-type units
Nullifies the ability cast on unit-targeted enemy upon being disjointed

ability_3.name: Bodyguard
ability_3.details: Grants a target ally hero a portion of Marci's lifesteal and attack damage bonuses. Whenever the ally attacks or is attacked by an enemy, Marci counter-attacks that target within a certain distance. Passively grants Marci lifesteal and bonus attack damage.
ability_3.description: Marci learned at a young age that the best asset in a scrap is a steady companion.

facet_effects.buddy_system: While Bodyguard is active, Marci's lifesteal heals her ally and the ally's lifesteal heals Marci. Increases duration.

technical_details: Grants flat unique bonus attack damage
Counter-attack component has a fixed duration downtime
interaction_notes: Cannot be cast on Hidden or Invulnerable units
Lifesteal is less effective when attacking creeps

ability_4.name: Unleash
ability_4.details: Taps a hidden power, increasing movement speed while gaining flurry charges that allow Marci to deliver a rapid sequence of strikes. Unlocks max attack speed upon cast. All Flurry attacks must be executed within the combo time window, otherwise, the combo fails and dispels the Flurry buff.
ability_4.description: Though some have sought to understand its origins, Marci rebuffs all attempts to divine the source of her power.
technical_details: The last strike in every flurry combo unleashes a damaging pulse around the target
interaction_notes: Unlocks max attack speed and removes the 700 attack speed cap
Applies a basic dispel on Marci with Scepter upgrade

facet_1.name: Victory Feast
facet_1.effects: Grants Mars and his allies inside the arena attack damage bonus for a short duration, additionally heals and restores mana, when an enemy hero dies within the Arena of Blood radius. The effect is lesser for ally heroes.

facet_2.name: Blood Sport
facet_2.effects: The Arena of Blood now obscures vision outside the arena radius. Enemy units within the radius do not have shared vision with their allied units.

effects: When activated, Bulwark creates invulnerable soldiers on both sides of Mars. These soldiers move alongside Mars, deal damage based on Mars' attack damage, knockback, and slow affected enemies' movement speed.
An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.

Increases the amount of units impaled.

level_25: +180 Arena of Blood Ally Health Regen

abilities.name: Dauntless
abilities.description: Never outnumbered, Mars gets bonus health regeneration amplification the more enemy heroes are close to him.
abilities.details: The ability effects are applied as follows: The checks for valid enemy heroes per server tick within the radius. Grants a bonus health regeneration amplification stack per outnumbered enemy heroes within the radius. Considers enemy clones and creep-heroes as heroes, illusions as creeps.

ability_1.name: Spear of Mars
ability_1.details: Max Travel Distance: 900/1000/1100/1200, Impale Search Radius: 125, Number of Impaled Units: 1 (2 with shard), Damage: 100/175/250/325 (200/275/350/425 with talent), Knock Distance: 75, Knock Duration: 0.25, Stun Duration: 1.3/1.6/1.9/2.2 (1.7/2/2.3/2.6 with talent)
ability_1.description: Throws his spear and damages each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned.

The spear projectile is created on Mars' current location and travels in a straight line
interaction_notes: Does not affect enemy heroes behind Mars upon cast
A spear may only impale 1 (2 with shard) valid enemy heroes at any given time
Grants flying vision as the spear travels

ability_2.name: God's Rebuke
ability_2.details: Effect Radius: 500 (600 with talent), Circle Sector Angle: 140°, Crit Damage: 150%/200%/250%/300% (215%/265%/315%/365% with talent), Knock Distance: 150, Knock Duration: 0.3, Move Speed Slow: 40%, Slow Duration: 2.5, Hero Attack Damage Bonus: 10/15/20/25
ability_2.description: Mars smashes enemies in front of him with his shield, knocking them back and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.

interaction_notes: Procs any attack modifiers and on-cast effects as per normal, except cleave

ability_3.name: Bulwark
ability_3.details: Front Angle: 140°, Side Angle: 240°, Front Damage Reduction: 40%/50%/60%/70%, Side Damage Reduction: 20%/25%/30%/35%, Attack Redirect Proc Chance: 70%, Front Redirect Range: 200, Back Redirect Range: 900, Self Move Speed Slow: 18%, Self Turn Rate Factor: 0
ability_3.description: Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides. When activated, Bulwark removes Mars' ability to attack, and locks the direction he is facing. Reduces Mars' movement speed and redirects a percentage of the attack projectiles aimed at allied units toward Mars instead.

The ability cooldown starts upon toggle off

ability_4.name: Arena of Blood
ability_4.details: Arena Radius: 550, Wall Width: 100, Effect Delay: 0.1, Arena Duration: 5/6/7, Aura Linger Duration: 0.5, Health Regen Bonus: 180 (with talent), Proc Distance: 160, Damage: 80/160/240, Attack Interval: 1, Knock Distance: 160, Knock Duration: 0.2, Slow Radius: 750, Facing Angle: 90°
ability_4.description: After a short formation time, Mars summons an arena lined with the undead warriors of the Ash Legion, who blocks enemy attacks and movement. Enemy heroes near the inside edge of the arena will be attacked by spears of his undead warriors, dealing damage and knocking them back. Applies a movement speed slow aura to enemy units without flying movement while they are facing the arena's walls.

facet_effects.victory_feast: Grants Mars and his allies inside the arena attack damage bonus for a short duration, additionally heals and restores mana, when an enemy hero dies within the Arena of Blood radius. The effect is lesser for ally heroes.
