technical_details: Fixed 1.2-second travel time regardless of distance
interaction_notes: Multiple Sticky Bombs may latch onto the same enemy unit
Chronosphere nullifies the ability cast

ability_2.name: Reactive Tazer
ability_2.details: Triggers an electric charge, granting the Techies team bonus movement speed for a short time.
ability_2.description: Applies an offensive basic dispel and disarms enemy units attacking the Techies team. After the buff duration ends, the charge explodes, applying all negative effects onto enemy units within the radius.
interaction_notes: Shard enables casting on allied units
Shard adds 300 damage to disarmed enemies

ability_3.name: Blast Off!
ability_3.details: Hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, deals massive area damage and stuns enemy units within the radius upon landing.
ability_3.description: The detonation upon landing also applies a non-lethal self-damage on Techies corresponding to a portion of their current health.

facet_effects.spleens_secret_sauce: Sacrifices more health for more damage - Max Health as Self Damage Factor: 0.15, Self Max Health to Damage Bonus Factor: 0.15

technical_details: Current Health as Self Damage Factor: 0.2
interaction_notes: Fixed 0.75-second leap duration
Can be interrupted by forced movement sources and Chronosphere

ability_4.name: Proximity Mines
ability_4.details: Plants an invisible mine that cannot be detected by certain True Sight sources. The mine is visible to enemy units within the mine proc radius, and detonates if an enemy unit is standing within the proc radius for a period of time.
ability_4.description: The mines reduces the affected enemy unit's magic resistance while dealing damage. The explosions deals more damage the closer the affected unit to the proximity radius.
interaction_notes: Permanently invisible after activation delay
Cannot be detected by most True Sight sources
Less effective on buildings (30% damage factor)

facet_1.name: Voidblades
facet_1.effects: Applies both of Meld's bonus attack damage component and the debuff to Psi Blades-affected enemy units.

facet_2.name: Refractor
facet_2.effects: Refraction gains an additional bonus attack damage charge every time a barrier instance is depleted.

facet_3.name: Hidden Reach
facet_3.effects: Grants bonus attack range over an effect delay duration upon Meld cast.

effects: Grants the Psionic Projection ability
Teleports Lanaya to the nearest Psionic Trap after channeling and detonates it upon arrival, damaging and slowing enemy units around it
Increases max Psionic Trap count and its vision radius
Lanaya's transposition applies silence within the radius upon arrival

level_15: Refraction Can Be Cast While Disabled
level_10: +5% Trap Move Speed Slow / +5% Psionic Projection Move Speed Slow

abilities.name: Third Eye
abilities.description: The Hidden Temple exposes Roshan's respawn timer to Layana's team.
abilities.details: The Roshan respawn timer is located above both the Scan and Glyph of Fortification ability.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Lanaya's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. She may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Hidden Innate Abilities with various functions

ability_1.name: Refraction
ability_1.details: Grants all damage barrier instances that negates damage. Both the damage negation component and the bonus attack damage component have a limited number of instances and are independent of each other.
ability_1.description: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.

facet_effects.refractor: Refraction gains an additional bonus attack damage charge every time a barrier instance is depleted.

interaction_notes: Interrupts Lanaya's channeling abilities upon cast
The ability has three main components that are applied upon cast and are independent of each other

ability_2.name: Meld
ability_2.details: Conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still. If the invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage and reduce the affected enemy unit's armor for the duration.
ability_2.description: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.

facet_effects.voidblades: Applies both of Meld's bonus attack damage component and the debuff to Psi Blades-affected enemy units.
facet_effects.hidden_reach: Grants bonus attack range over an effect delay duration upon Meld cast. Effect Delay: 1, Attack Range Bonus: 400

interaction_notes: All offensive ability components do not affect buildings
The invisibility component persists upon losing ability through Morph or Spell Steal

ability_3.name: Psi Blades
ability_3.details: Attacks slice through the attacked unit, spilling and damaging enemy units reduced by a percentage per unit behind it. Grants self bonus attack range.
ability_3.description: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.

facet_effects.voidblades: Applies both of Meld's bonus attack damage component and the debuff to Psi Blades-affected enemy units.

technical_details: Attack Damage to Spill Damage Factor: 0.7/0.8/0.9/1
interaction_notes: Do not spill damage when attacking buildings regardless of the ability visual effects

ability_4.name: Psionic Trap
ability_4.details: Places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movements. Marks the ground with magical and psionic traps.
ability_4.description: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.
interaction_notes: Does not block neutral creep camps
Roshan destroys this unit in one punch
Specifically does not grant vision within Roshan's pit

ability_5.name: Psionic Projection
ability_5.details: Teleports Lanaya to the nearest Psionic Trap after channeling and detonates it upon arrival, damaging and slowing enemy units around it. Projecting herself to the distance does not break Lanaya's Meld upon cast.
ability_5.description: In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.
interaction_notes: Acquiring Aghanim's Shard unlocks this ability
Root and Leash sources prevent the teleport component but don't interrupt channeling

sub_ability.name: Trap
sub_ability.details: When sprung at Lanaya's command, the traps apply a movement speed slow based on the charged-up time. Only deals damage over time if the trap is fully charged.
interaction_notes: Does not interrupt Lanaya's channeling abilities upon cast
Cannot be cast when there are no Psionic Traps present

facet_1.name: Condemned
facet_1.effects: Sunder no longer has a minimum health threshold for affected enemies.

facet_2.name: Soul Fragment
facet_2.effects: Conjure Image illusions are now created at full health for a current health cost that replaces the mana cost. -100% Mana Cost

effects: Grants the Terror Wave ability
Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions fearing all enemy units upon impact
After the effect delay, he metamorphs into an even more imposing form. If already in Demon Form, the duration is extended
All Demon Form sources removes Demon Zeal, and vice versa
Grants the Demon Zeal ability
Grants bonus health regeneration, bonus movement speed, and bonus attack speed within the radius to all affected illusions
Upon cast, the Demon Zeal grants Reflection-based illusions within the radius a certain bonus attack speed and movement speed
All Demon Form sources removes Demon Zeal, and vice versa

level_15: +10% Reflection Move Speed Slow/Damage +10 Reflection Attack Speed Slow

abilities.name: Dark Unity
abilities.description: Grants Terrorblade's images within the aura radius outgoing damage bonus. Vice versa, applies an outgoing damage reduction outside the aura radius.
abilities.details: Applies a generic outgoing damage manipulation on Terrorblade's illusions within the radius. Stacks additively with other damage manipulation sources.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Terrorblade's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling, excluding passive innate abilities.
abilities.details: No longer has a chance to block a flat amount of physical attack damage from other incoming attacks while in Demon Form.

ability_1.name: Reflection
ability_1.details: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all enemy heroes in a target area. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.
ability_1.description: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy. Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
technical_details: Can affect enemy units at max 1200-distance away with the cast range and effect radius
Creates Reflection-based illusions of all debuff-affected enemy units
Illusions are invulnerable, uncontrollable and have unobstructed movement with absolute movement speed
interaction_notes: Recasting the ability creates another independent Reflection-based illusion instance per affected enemy hero
Both leveling up the ability and learning the talent do not update the current active Reflection-based illusions instance

ability_2.name: Conjure Image
ability_2.details: Conjures an illusion of Terrorblade correspondingly to his current health.
ability_2.description: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade. Facing MORE Terrorblades!
technical_details: The Conjure Image-based illusion is visually distinguishable from Terrorblade for everyone
Can have a max 3 (4) Conjure-based illusions at the same time
interaction_notes: Soul Fragment facet: Illusions are now created at full health for a current health cost that replaces the mana cost

ability_3.name: Metamorphosis
ability_3.details: Transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack.
ability_3.description: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control. Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
technical_details: All of Terrorblade's illusions that are within the radius will metamorph as well
Turns Terrorblade and all illusions within the radius into a ranged unit
interaction_notes: All Demon Form sources removes Demon Zeal, and vice versa
Recasting the ability refreshes its buff duration

ability_4.name: Sunder
ability_4.details: Severing the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain after the exchange.
ability_4.description: You didn't need that life, did you? The Demon Marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
technical_details: Considers clones and illusions as heroes, creep-heroes as creeps
Cannot directly be unit-targeted on the Spirit Bear
Sets both Terrorblade's and the unit target's health utilizing specific formulas
interaction_notes: Condemned facet: No longer has a minimum health threshold for affected enemies
Does not affect debuff immune units of all factions

ability_5.name: Demon Zeal
ability_5.details: Grants bonus health regeneration, bonus movement speed, and bonus attack speed within the radius to all affected illusions.
ability_5.description: Fear is fueled by confusion when Terrorblade's enemies see that the first cut he makes is one to embolden himself.
technical_details: Acquiring Aghanim's Shard unlocks this ability in the fourth ability slot
All of Terrorblade's illusions that are within the radius are affected by Demon Zeal as well
interaction_notes: All Demon Form sources removes Demon Zeal, and vice versa
The current health cost is rounded down, utilizes setting health and is non-lethal

ability_6.name: Terror Wave
ability_6.details: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions fearing all enemy units upon impact.
ability_6.description: A shockwave of power strong enough to break the walls of Foulfell itself.
technical_details: Acquiring Aghanim's Scepter unlocks this ability in the fifth ability slot
After the effect delay, he metamorphs into an even more imposing form
interaction_notes: All Demon Form sources removes Demon Zeal, and vice versa
All of Terrorblade's illusions that are within the radius will metamorph as well

facet_1.name: Kraken Swell
facet_1.effects: Kraken Shell grants Tidehunter permanent flat bonus damage block per enemy hero kill with the Anchor Smash debuff applied.

facet_2.name: Krill Eater
facet_2.effects: The Krill Eater innately has lesser base attack range, but higher strength gain. +0.5 Str Gain, -60 Attack Range, -60 Anchor Smash Radius. This ability component levels up with Tidehunter.

effects: Gush becomes a ground-targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line
Reduces cooldown
Grants the Dead in the Water ability
Attaches and leashes a heavy anchor to an enemy hero
Attempting to move a certain distance from the anchor sets its movement speed value and forces the affected unit to drag the Anchor behind them

abilities.name: Blubber
abilities.description: Tidehunter's hide also removes negative status effects if the player-based damage taken crosses a threshold.
abilities.details: Applies a strong dispel per damage threshold accumulated (after all reductions). The damage threshold counter resets when Tidehunter does not take player-based damage for the last 7 seconds.

abilities.name: Krill Eater
abilities.description: The Krill Eater innately has lesser base attack range, but higher strength gain.
abilities.details: Additionally grants base attack range per hero level. This ability levels up with Tidehunter.

ability_1.name: Gush
ability_1.details: Wave Travel Distance: 2200 (with Scepter), Wave Radius: 260 (with Scepter)
ability_1.description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
technical_details: Has unit and point targeting functionality
With Scepter upgrade changes to wave ability
Wave grants 2-second 200 radius ground vision per affected enemy
interaction_notes: No longer procs Spell Block sources with Scepter
No longer can be disjointed with Scepter

ability_2.name: Kraken Shell
ability_2.description: Passively damage block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage.
technical_details: Kraken Shell is an ensured damage block source
Does not interact with Set attack damage sources
Kraken Swell facet grants permanent flat bonus damage block per enemy hero kill
interaction_notes: Sources with lesser damage block values have no effect
Active component doubles blocked damage with movement speed penalty

ability_3.name: Anchor Smash
ability_3.description: Swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their main attack damage.
technical_details: Roshan is innately immune to all Anchor Smash ability effects
Krill Eater facet reduces base radius and grants radius increase per hero level
Talent grants passive proc chance and building damage
interaction_notes: Instant attack has True Strike
Not affected by disarm sources
Affects Ancient creeps, Fogged units, Invisible units

ability_4.name: Dead in the Water
ability_4.description: Attaches and leashes a heavy anchor to an enemy hero. Attempting to move a certain distance from the anchor sets its movement speed value and forces the affected unit to drag the Anchor behind them.
technical_details: Creates Anchor unit that leashes target
Anchor is not affected by Chronosphere
interaction_notes: Anchor teleports along with targeted enemy
Spell Block nullifies ability and instant kills Anchor
Disjoint sources instant kill the Anchor

ability_5.name: Ravage
ability_5.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
technical_details: Applies effects with 250-wide ring centered around Tidehunter
Has 1.38-second expand time toward max effect radius
Applies 350-distance upward movement over first 0.5 seconds
interaction_notes: Effects do not move with Tidehunter after cast
Teleport sources heading toward Tidehunter may avoid tentacles
Forced movement no longer affects debuff immune targets

facet_1.name: Shredder
facet_1.effects: Shatters the tree it latched to with Timber Chain upon reaching it. The tree splinters in all directions, damaging and applying a movement speed slow to affected enemy units.

facet_2.name: Twisted Chakram
facet_2.effects: Twisted Chakram is Timbersaw's fourth ability with the selected facet. Launches a secondary saw-blade that deals damage and applies movement speed slow on affected enemy units based on their current health it passes through, then returns to Timbersaw.

effects: Now has an active component that grants Timbersaw a replenishing all damage barrier that gets stronger the more enemy heroes are close
The damage barrier explodes when it expires, damaging nearby enemy units correspondingly to its current barrier value
Grants max Reactive Armor stacks upon cast
Grants the Flamethrower ability
Releases a destructive flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing
Deals damage per second, applies a movement speed slow and destroys trees

level_20: +10 Exposure Therapy Heal per Tree Destroyed
level_15: +6 Reactive Armor Max Stacks / +1 Reactive Armor Stack per Hero Attack
level_10: +0.25 Reactive Armor Health Regen per Stack

abilities.name: Exposure Therapy
abilities.description: Timbersaw restores a flat amount of mana per tree destroyed.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Chakram. Talent upgrade additionally restores health per tree destroyed.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: The Shredder's hero model has hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling, excluding passive innate abilities.
abilities.details: Contains multiple hidden innate abilities that require channeling to activate.

ability_1.name: Whirling Death
ability_1.details: Deals damage and bonus damage per destroyed tree within the radius centered around Timbersaw, while reducing the affected enemy hero's primary attribute for a brief duration.
ability_1.description: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the vines and plants of nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.
technical_details: Interrupts Timbersaw's channeling abilities upon cast
Attribute reduction is truncated on HUD
interaction_notes: For Universal heroes, reduces lesser portion of all attributes
Reapplying debuff creates independent instance

ability_2.name: Timber Chain
ability_2.details: Fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling Timbersaw towards it. Deals damage to enemy units within Timbersaw's travel path.
ability_2.description: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.
technical_details: Chain travels until max distance or connects with tree
Grants vision around projectile tip while traveling
Stops pulling when affected by cyclone or forced movement
interaction_notes: Root sources do not interrupt self-forced movement
Affects invisible and untargetable units

ability_3.name: Reactive Armor
ability_3.details: Grants bonus armor and bonus health regeneration whenever an enemy hero attacks Timbersaw.
ability_3.description: The saw-suit is equipped to react to the slightest touch with fortified defenses.
technical_details: Considers clones, illusions and creep-heroes as heroes
Scepter adds active component with damage barrier
Barrier explodes on expiration or death
interaction_notes: Break sources disable stack gain but don't remove existing stacks
Illusions cannot utilize bonus armor component

ability_4.name: Chakram
ability_4.details: Launches a saw-blade that deals damage, applies a movement speed slow, and cuts down trees in its path when launched and retracted.
ability_4.description: The ultimate in anti-flora weaponry.
technical_details: Grants flying vision at target location
Returns when exceeding max distance or manually recalled
interaction_notes: Can affect same enemy twice (launch and return)
Movement speed slow based on current health percentage

ability_5.name: Twisted Chakram
ability_5.details: Launches a secondary saw-blade that deals damage and applies movement speed slow on affected enemy units based on their current health it passes through, then returns to Timbersaw.
ability_5.description: A happy little accident in the lab turned wild new weapon in the forest.
technical_details: Available only with Twisted Chakram facet
interaction_notes: Independent slow debuff from regular Chakram
Unavailable in Ability Draft

ability_6.name: Flamethrower
ability_6.details: Releases a destructive flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Deals damage per second, applies a movement speed slow and destroys trees.
ability_6.description: A single saw can only cut so much. A single spark can burn forever.
interaction_notes: Affects buildings with reduced damage
Requires drafting Chakram in Ability Draft

facet_1.name: Repair Bots
facet_1.effects: March of the Machines applies a non-stacking heal over time while passing through allied heroes.

facet_2.name: Translocator
facet_2.effects: When Defense Matrix is active on Tinker, the barrier dispels Tinker and then relocates him to a random point within a certain distance upon the all damage barrier depletion.

effects: Applies a stacking debuff that reduces the model size, and both the current and max health of affected enemy heroes
Laser also bounces once within the radius, prioritizing the farthest enemy hero
Increases cast range
Grants the Warp Flare ability
Fires a damaging flare towards an enemy unit and applies a debuff that reduces both the affected enemy unit's cast range and attack range

abilities.name: Eureka!
abilities.description: Grants Tinker an item-based cooldown reduction per intelligence, with a cap.
abilities.details: Only affects item abilities. Requires Tinker to have 180 intelligence for the max item cooldown reduction value.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Tinker's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. It may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Contains hidden innate abilities that require channeling to function

ability_1.name: Laser
ability_1.details: Blinds and damages the unit-targeted enemy.
ability_1.description: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.
technical_details: All ability effects are visible and audible to everyone during the cast point
Stacks additively with other blind sources and multiplicatively with evasion sources
interaction_notes: The model size reduction affects debuff immune enemy units
Does not proc Spell Block sources on secondary affected targets

ability_2.name: March of the Machines
ability_2.details: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
ability_2.description: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.

facet_effects.repair_bots: Applies a non-stacking heal over time while passing through allied heroes

technical_details: Robots detonate upon collision or reaching max distance
interaction_notes: Does not interact with Couriers, Hidden units, or Invulnerable units
The ability sound effects upon cast are audible ally-only

ability_3.name: Defense Matrix
ability_3.details: Applies an all damage barrier and grants bonus status resistance to the affected allied unit.
ability_3.description: A gifted mind unconstrained by moral or ethical boundaries tends to attract an adversary or two.

facet_effects.translocator: When Defense Matrix is active on Tinker, the barrier dispels Tinker and then relocates him to a random point within a certain distance upon barrier depletion

technical_details: Doubletap casts the ability on Tinker
Reapplying the buff refreshes the duration and resets the damage barrier capacity
Stacks multiplicatively with other status resistance sources
interaction_notes: Root sources disable the Translocator component upon barrier depletion
Leash sources disable the Translocator component upon barrier depletion

ability_4.name: Warp Flare
ability_4.details: Fires a damaging flare towards an enemy unit and applies a debuff that reduces both the affected enemy unit's cast range and attack range.
ability_4.description: Tinker's deadliest weapon instantly turns an enemy into space dust. Research to resolve the annoying 'perfect copy' side effect... is ongoing.
technical_details: Acquiring Aghanim's Shard unlocks this ability
Teleport distance is defined as Current Cast Range + 100, MAX = 2000
interaction_notes: Nullifies the ability upon projectile impact with Spell Block
Cannot be cast on Roshan at all

ability_5.name: Keen Conveyance
ability_5.details: Globally convey to an allied unit conditionally. Self-cast automatically convey to the fountain after a certain distance.
ability_5.description: As Boush likes to say, "There is nothing the arcane can accomplish that the curious mind cannot reproduce given time. And proper funding, of course."
technical_details: This ability levels up with Rearm
interaction_notes: Root sources nullify both the ability cast and cancel the teleport if channeling
Teleport is interrupted on allied summon units upon death

ability_6.name: Rearm
ability_6.details: Resets the cooldown of Tinker's abilities. Does not affect item abilities cooldowns.
ability_6.description: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
technical_details: This ability levels up with Keen Conveyance
Only resets Tinker's current abilities' cooldown, including this ability
This ability cannot be acquired by the Grand Magus by design
interaction_notes: Unacquirable by Spell Steal
In Ability Draft, replenishes 1 charge to charged-based abilities upon channeling completion

general.roles: Carry, Nuker, Pusher, Initiator, Durable, Disabler

facet_1.name: Crash Landing
facet_1.effects: Tossed units slow and deal bonus damage to other targets at the Toss landing location in a larger radius. +125 Effect Radius, ×1.2 Landing Damage Factor

facet_2.name: Insurmountable
facet_2.effects: Grants bonus status resistance and bonus slow resistance per current strength

effects: Grants the Tree Volley ability
Tiny channels to throw random trees within the radius towards the area-targeted location
Deals damage correspondingly to Tiny's attack damage upon per tree impact while applying various attack effects
Attacks on buildings are more effective when Tiny is wielding a tree
Increases the damage of the thrown tree projectile
Removes the number of attacks limit for Tree Grab - all Tree Grab effects are permanent on Tiny until he throws the tree out

level_20: +60 Tree Grab Unit Attack Damage Bonus

abilities.name: Craggy Exterior

abilities.name: Insurmountable

abilities.details: Selecting the Insurmountable facet unlocks this ability

ability_1.name: Avalanche
ability_1.details: Bombards an area with rocks, continuously doing small intervals of stun and damage to enemy units within the effect radius
ability_1.description: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant

ability_2.name: Toss
ability_2.details: Grabs the nearest unit, regardless of its faction, within the radius around Tiny. The launched unit becomes a projectile, and homes into the targeted unit, dealing damage within the landing radius upon impact
ability_2.description: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors

ability_3.name: Tree Grab
ability_3.details: Wields a tree as a weapon for a limited number of attacks. Grants Tiny bonus attack range, and a psuedo-cleave attack effect until the tree is thrown
ability_3.description: Sticks and stones break all the bones, with structures sure to follow

ability_4.name: Tree Volley
ability_4.details: Tiny channels to throw random trees within the radius towards the area-targeted location. Deals damage correspondingly to Tiny's attack damage upon per tree impact while applying various attack effects
ability_4.description: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones

ability_5.name: Grow
ability_5.details: Gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor while slowing his total attack speed
ability_5.description: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries

facet_1.name: Primeval Power
facet_1.effects: Grants Treant bonus base attack damage per hero level.

facet_2.name: Sapling
facet_2.effects: Leech Seed can be ground targeted, planting a tree that heals allies and damages all enemy units within the radius. If the tree is cut down, it regrows on the next ability interval.

effects: Grants the Eyes In The Forest ability

Treant become invisible near trees and root enemies upon breaking invisible

abilities.name: Nature's Guise

ability_2.description: Plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it.

Grants Visage a movement speed and attack speed buff independently from the debuff applied to the affected enemy unit. All ability bonuses are applied as a buff to each Familiars independently within the radius.

facet_effects.sepulchre: Grave Chill is now an area-targeted ability and applies all ability effects to enemy units within the radius. Effect Radius: 300, Move Speed Bonus per Enemy: 3.6%/4.8%/6%/7.2%, Attack Speed Bonus per Enemy: 7.5/12/16.5/21
facet_effects.faithful_followers: Issues an attack command to all current Familiars upon Grave Chill cast. Attack Search Range: 550

technical_details: All ability effects are applied immediately despite the visual effects, and cannot be disjointed
interaction_notes: Nullifies the ability with Spell Block
Sepulchre does not proc Spell Block sources on secondary affected targets

ability_2.name: Soul Assumption
ability_2.details: Focuses all gathered Soul Assumption charges to a single spell projectile, and deals damage corresponding to the gathered charges.
ability_2.description: Gathers Soul Assumption charges each time nearby heroes take a certain amount of damage. The damage counter only grants charges from the damage instances of the following ranges.

facet_effects.death_toll: Soul Assumption applies a debuff on the affected enemy unit that grants gold bonus corresponding to the current charges upon the unit's death. Gold Bonus per Charge: 30, Debuff Duration: 3, Creep Gold Bonus Factor: 0.15

interaction_notes: Nullifies the ability with Spell Block
Proc Spell Block sources on secondary affected targets independently

ability_3.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
ability_3.details: Generates a stone-layered buff that manipulates incoming damage. Removes a stack per player-based damage taken above a certain damage threshold.
ability_3.description: The aura affects and applies its values corresponding to Visage's on all Summoned Familiars within the radius. However, the min damage threshold proc does not apply to them.
interaction_notes: Disables the buff stack gain with Break Sources
However, existing stacks are not removed

ability_4.name: Silent as the Grave
ability_4.details: Grants Visage and its Familiars bonus movement speed and invisiblilty for the duration.
ability_4.description: Upon losing the invisibility buff in any way, the ability now grants Visage and its Familiars bonus attack damage. Only affects Visage and his Familiars.
interaction_notes: Acquiring Aghanim's Scepter unlocks this ability
Does not interrupt Visage's channeling abilities upon cast

ability_5.name: Summon Familiars
ability_5.details: Conjures blind and controllable Familiars to fight for Visage. Familiars have flying movement and can turn into Stone Form.
ability_5.description: All current Familiars halt their movement and teleport over to Visage's side after an effect delay with Alt-Cast toggled on. Familiars cannot act while preparing for the teleportation.

facet_effects.faithful_followers: Familiars will automatically attack Visage's last-attacked target. They will return if that enemy unit is out of Visage's attack range, or when Visage issues a cancel current action or hold position command. Set Move Speed: 440, Set Attack Range: 350, Set Gold Bounty: 50

interaction_notes: Interrupts Visage's channeling abilities upon cast
Instant kill all current Familiars from a previous cast upon cast

facet_1.name: Sanctuary
facet_1.effects: Resonant Pulse wraps Inai in an all-damage barrier that gains increased damage absorption per enemy hero hit. +15/20/25/30 Barrier Bonus per Enemy Hit

facet_2.name: Call of the Void
facet_2.effects: Upon reassembling from Dissimilate, lesser Aether Remnants are created at a few portals furthest from the Void Spirit. These Aether Remnants at the furthest portals have a lesser search range, a shorter pull distance and duration, and deal less damage at its corresponding level. ×0.7 Remnant Ability Values

effects: Now applies silences to all affected enemy units, and is now a charged-based ability with a replenish time
Enemy creeps within the Remnant's path no longer destroys the remnant, but deals damage per second to them corresponding to the total damage value
Grants True Sight centered around the Remnant, and creates an additional watcher path that rotates around the remnant

abilities.name: Intrinsic Edge
abilities.description: Grants Inai additional secondary bonuses from all attributes.
abilities.details: Grants the following secondary bonuses per level: 0.325 health regeneration bonus, 0.4576 main armor bonus, 0.1953 mana regeneration bonus

ability_1.name: Aether Remnant
ability_1.details: Dispatches a remnant that stands watch over an area-of-effect at the point-targeted location, facing the vector-targeted direction.
ability_1.description: The remnant pulls an enemy unit that crosses its gaze and damages it.
interaction_notes: The ability has two area-of-effect components
Upon cast, the remnant moves to the point-targeted location at 900-speed
0.4 seconds after casting, the remnant activates

ability_2.name: Dissimilate
ability_2.details: Temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which Inai can reassemble himself.
ability_2.description: Deals damage to all enemy units within the portal radius upon exit.

facet_effects.call_of_the_void: Upon reassembling from Dissimilate, lesser Aether Remnants are created at a few portals furthest from the Void Spirit

interaction_notes: Creates 1 portal at Inai's current location upon cast
The other 6 subsequent portals are created in a hexagon-shaped formation
Can choose its reappearing portal with any issued order

ability_3.name: Resonant Pulse
ability_3.details: Swiftly creates a physical damage barrier and emits a single damaging pulse around Inai.
ability_3.description: Increases the barrier bonus per affected enemy hero.

facet_effects.sanctuary: Resonant Pulse wraps Inai in an all damage barrier instead

technical_details: Barrier Bonus per Enemy Hero Hit: 35/50/65/80
interaction_notes: All ability effects center at Inai's cast location and expand outward in 1200-speed
Interrupts Inai's channeling abilities upon cast

ability_4.details: Tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, slicing all enemy units along the path.
ability_4.description: This attack inflicts a void debuff that applies a movement speed slow, and then detonates.
interaction_notes: Immediately teleports Inai toward the point-targeted location
Does not disjoint incoming projectiles
The instant attack procs any attack modifiers

facet_1.name: Champion of Gorroth
facet_1.effects: Warlock Permanent Immolation deal damage per second bonus based on the sum of Warlock's current health and mana regeneration values. +0.9× Hero Health Regen to Damage Factor, +0.9× Hero Mana Regen to Damage Factor

facet_2.name: Black Grimoire
facet_2.effects: Grants Warlock the item Black Grimoire, which can be consumed to gain experience for each kill Warlock participated in.

effects: Now summons an additional Golem with reduced base attack damage
Creates uncontrollable Minor Imps of the current Eldritch Summoning ability level per certain Upheaval channeling interval
Increases both Eldritch Summoning's current and max ability level
Increases the summoned Minor Imps' level
Increases Eldritch Explosion's current and max ability level

level_20: +40 Upheaval Damage Increment, +40 Upheaval Max Damage
level_15: +10 Upheaval Attack Speed per Second, +70 Upheaval Max Attack Speed

abilities.name: Eldritch Summoning
abilities.description: Whenever a unit dies under effect of any of Warlock's abilities, an uncontrollable Minor Imp is spawned in their place, and chases after nearby units.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Chaotic Offering. The summoned Minor Imps chases after Fatal Bonds-affected enemy units, prioritizing enemy heroes. When there are no nearby valid enemy units, the Minor Imps start attacking buildings.

abilities.name: Black Grimoire
abilities.description: Starts the game with a neutral consumable item — the Black Grimoire. This can be consumed anytime to grant Warlock experience per accumulated charge.
abilities.details: Gains a charge for each hero kill that Warlock participates in. Requires facet selection to obtain.

ability_1.name: Fatal Bonds
ability_1.details: Binds several enemy units together, causing a portion of the damage taken to one of them to be felt by the others.
ability_1.description: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
technical_details: Roshan is innately immune to this ability
interaction_notes: The summoned Minor Imps chases after Fatal Bonds-affected enemy units, prioritizing enemy heroes

ability_2.name: Shadow Word
ability_2.details: Either heals allied units or damages enemy units within the radius over time.

technical_details: Applies effects in 0.5-second intervals over 20 instances
Can affect units of all factions
interaction_notes: Doubletap or portrait-casting casts the ability on Warlock

ability_3.name: Upheaval
ability_3.details: A powerful current that grows stronger per channeled second. All ability effects lingers for a short duration after exiting the effect radius.
ability_3.description: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.
technical_details: Creates negative aura at targeted location
Ability values increment per server tick
Max values achieved at different seconds per level
interaction_notes: With Shard: Creates uncontrollable Minor Imps per 2-second channel interval

ability_4.name: Chaotic Offering
ability_4.details: Summons a Golem and stuns enemy units within the radius.
ability_4.description: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.
technical_details: The conjured Golem is partially immune to movement speed slow sources
Golem has Flaming Fists and Permanent Immolation abilities
Trees within effect radius are destroyed
interaction_notes: With talent: Passively summons a Golem on Warlock's death location
Champion of Gorroth facet affects Permanent Immolation damage

facet_1.name: Skitterstep
facet_1.effects: Shukuchi has a greater haste movement, and applies a movement speed slow on affected enemy units when Weaver passes through them. +50 Haste Speed

facet_2.name: Hivemind
facet_2.effects: Each Beetle of The Swarm attached to an enemy hero grants experience to the Weaver over time.

effects: Enables casting on allied heroes, applying most Time Lapse effects on the unit-targeted allied hero.
Puts a pre-Germinate Attack mark on enemy units it passes through for a brief duration.
Enemy units with the Shukuchi mark are attacked with a secondary Geminate Attack upon Weaver revealing itself.

abilities.name: Rewoven
abilities.description: Grants self attack range bonus for a short period of time per ability cast.
abilities.details: Utilizes a timer to track Weaver's current ability cast count. Each stack places a new buff on Weaver, with each buff duration independent of the other.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Weaver's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. It may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Burns an enemy's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Mana Break applied to enemy units from Weaver's illusions are less effective.

ability_1.name: The Swarm
ability_1.details: Launches a swarm of Beetles, that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing the affected enemy units' armor until it is killed.
ability_1.description: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.

facet_effects.hivemind: Each Beetle attached to an enemy hero grants experience to the Weaver over time (5/8/11/14 exp per instance)

interaction_notes: Beetles are not attackable when traveling as a swarm
Creep attacks are less effective on the Beetles
Beetles are destroyed if the host unit becomes invulnerable

ability_2.name: Shukuchi
ability_2.details: Shifts out of visibility while reaching max movement speed — doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
ability_2.description: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.

facet_effects.skitterstep: Haste Speed: 600, Move Speed Slow: 100%, Slow Duration: 0.2

interaction_notes: Does not interrupt channeling abilities upon cast
Disjoints projectiles upon cast if enemy has no True Sight

ability_3.name: Geminate Attack
ability_3.details: Allows Weaver to dispatch more than one attack at once.

interaction_notes: Active attack modifier with Autocast on by default
Extra attacks have Global attack range
Procs any attack modifiers and on-cast effects as per normal

ability_4.name: Time Lapse

ability_4.description: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.
interaction_notes: Does not cancel shift-queue commands
Issues a stop order upon teleporting back
Sets health and mana to lapsed time value without using heal or mana restore

facet_1.name: Tangled

facet_2.name: Killshot

effects: Grants Lyralei an invisibility that does not break by attacking or casting any abilities, and reduces incoming physical attack damage taken while active.

abilities.details: Leash sources have precedence over min movement speed sources.

ability_1.name: Shackleshot

interaction_notes: Affects units up to 3125 range away

interaction_notes: Interrupts channeling abilities upon cast

Removes the debuff limit per affected enemy

Hitting all enemy units within the radius

abilities.details: Other Experience Fountain notes apply.

abilities.name: Vampiric Spirit
abilities.description: Delays the death of Wraith King when killed. The King enters Wraith Form, granting himself unobstructed movement with bonus attack speed and bonus movement speed for a short duration. Grants Wraith King and his Skeleton Warriors' attacks lifesteal.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Reincarnation. The Reincarnation active component is inactive during Wraith Form.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Wraith King's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling, excluding passive innate abilities.

ability_1.name: Wraithfire Blast
ability_1.details: Sears an enemy unit with a spectral fire projectile that stuns and damages on hit, then slows and damages over time.

abilities.name: Magical Damage Block
abilities.description: Consumes a charge to block a fixed portion magical damage from damage instances over a certain value.
notes: Infused Raindrops has the highest priority in the group of damage negating abilities, blocking damage before any of them do.
When combined with other damage-negating effects (e.g. Aphotic Shield or Refraction), Infused Raindrops negate the damage while the others do not.
Has a higher priority than damage return effects (e.g. Dispersion and Blade Mail), meaning it first blocks damage before it.
Has a lower priority than Mana Shield, meaning Mana Shield first reduces damage before Infused Raindrop blocks it.
Only triggers on magical damage equal or greater than 75 (before reductions) coming from abilities and attacks, excluding self-inflicted damage and damage dealt by allies.
Ignores every form of incoming damage amplification, but does not ignore outgoing damage amplification.
Does not stack with other magical damage barriers.
If multiple sources of barriers are active on a unit, all of them lose capacity from the same absorbed damage instance.
However, if a damage instance is greater than the capacity of all barriers individually, the damage gets blocked as if the barriers were one barrier with combined capacity.
Neither consumes charges nor blocks any damage while on cooldown.

additionalInfo: When having multiple Infused Raindrops, all of them lose charges simultaneously, but only one of them blocks the damage.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Grants the wielder's attacks a chance to pierce through evasion, and to release a bolt of electricity on the target, that leaps between other nearby targets, dealing magical damage to all of them.
notes: Chain Lightning can proc on invisible enemies (i.e. instant attacks hitting an invisible enemy)

Chain Lightning uses pseudo-random distribution

Against a lone target, Chain Lightning adds an average of 27.5 magical spell damage to every attack

additionalInfo: Maelstrom is a very good item for speeding up farming. If the extra experience is not needed, it is a good alternative to Hand of Midas

abilities.name: Quell

notes: Quell is considered as a conditional attack damage bonus.

It can be reduced only by flat reductions (e.g. damage block).
Since it is considered bonus attack damage, it is not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions.
The attack damage bonus adapts immediately depending on the wielder's range type (melee or ranged).
Stacks with the Quell of Battle Fury, but not with additional Quelling Blades.
Does not work against Buildings, Ward-type units, Illusions, Spirit Bear, Couriers, Allied units

Stacks diminishingly with other evasion sources

Tango.name: Tango
Tango.description: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Consumes the target tree to gain health regeneration for some time. The tree is destroyed in the process.
notes: Can target allied heroes as well. Doing so gives one Tango charge to them, however, this single Tango expires after a while.
When cast on an Iron Branch tree, or on a tree from Sprout with the Soothing Saplings facet, the health regen duration is greatly increased.
The buff of successive casts do not stack but refresh the duration instead.
Can regenerate up to 112 (224) health over its full duration.
All 3 charges can regenerate up to 336 (672) health.
When targeting an allied hero, it grants them a Tango (Shared) in their inventory, instead of granting health regeneration.
If the targeted ally's inventory is full, the item is dropped on the ground.
Treats the Spirit Bear as heroes, and illusions as creeps.
Although it can be cast on other creep-heroes and clones with inventory, but doing so has no effect.
A shared Tango disappears 40 seconds after being created.
Once created, a countdown appears on the item's icon, visible to everyone, showing the remaining duration on the shared Tango.

additionalInfo: A full set of Tangos is not shareable. However, it is possible to give allies a charge, Tango (Shared), by casting it on them.

Tiara of Selemene.name: Tiara of Selemene
Tiara of Selemene.description: A symbol of favor bestowed upon the high priestess of Selemene.

Town Portal Scroll.name: Town Portal Scroll

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Teleports its wielder to the unit-targeted allied building. Increases the teleport channel time when multiple allied heroes simutaneously channels to the same allied building.
notes: Acquiring Boots of Travel unlocks subsequent Teleport levels
Consumes mana, goes into cooldown and does nothing when channeling is interrupted
Cannot be cast while rooted or leashed
Doubletap automatically targets the Fountain when exceeding min distance
Requires Boots of Travel upgrades to directly target allied units
Channel time increases linearly for multiple heroes teleporting to same building
Does not increase channel time when teleporting to Fountain
All ability effects are visible and audible to everyone
Grants 1-second 200-radius flying vision at teleport destination during channeling

additionalInfo: Alt shows your allied heroes' teleport status and cooldowns under their portraits
All heroes start the game with an unsellable Town Portal Scroll
Grants a charge whenever a hero dies to an enemy or allied unit
Town Portal Scrolls gained upon death have no gold value and don't affect Net Worth
Unsellable Town Portal Scrolls in a stack make every item in the stack unsellable
Heroes have a dedicated Town Portal Scroll slot on the HUD
Item can neither be dropped nor carried in inventory or backpack
Couriers can transport the item and allow dropping/sharing when in courier inventory

Tranquil Boots.name: Tranquil Boots
Tranquil Boots.description: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

abilities.name: Break
abilities.description: Whenever the wielder attacks a hero or is attacked by a any unit, the boots' passive health regeneration bonus is lost, and the movement speed bonus is reduced for a while.
notes: Reduces Tranquil Boots' bonuses to 40 movement speed and 0 health regeneration
Only triggers when the wielder's attacks land, or when an attack lands on the wielder
Missed or disjointed attacks do not trigger Break
Also reacts on instant attacks that normally do not trigger on-attack effects
Does not break upon attacking non-hero units. Treats creep-heroes as creeps
The downtime is affected by cooldown reductions. However, although cooldown resetting effects visually reset the cooldown, they do not reset the broken state
Tranquil Boots are always in the broken state for illusions, and permanently appear broken on allied illusions. Do not appear broken on enemy illusions, until they attack or are attacked

additionalInfo: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of Boots of Speed-based items do not stack
Stacks with all other movement speed bonus
The health regeneration of multiple Tranquil Boots-based items fully stacks

states.contains: Full bonuses: +14 Health Regeneration, +65 Move Speed
Reduced bonuses: +0 Health Regeneration, +40 Move Speed

abilities.description: When cast on an ally, consumes a charge to grant the target allied hero bonus health regeneration for a while. When cast on an enemy, consumes a charge to deal damage over time to the target for a while.
notes: Has no recharge time. Cooldown resetting effects do not restore charges.
Gains charges whenever an enemy hero dies within range. Gains more charges when at 0 charges.
Also gains charges when the wielder dies while at 0 charges.
Taking more than 0 damage from any other player (after reductions and not flagged as HP Removal) dispels the healing buff.
Taking more than 0 damage from Roshan (after reductions) dispels the healing buff.
When upgraded to Spirit Vessel, all the current charges are carried over.
Double-tapping automatically targets self.
Does not interrupt the wielder's channeling abilities.
Can only be cast on heroes, including illusions and creep-heroes.
Gains charge for each enemy hero that dies within the radius.
If the item is at 0 charges, it gains charges at once, otherwise, it gains charge.
Does not gain charges from Illusions, Clones, or Creep-Heroes.
Does not gain a charge if the enemy hero has Reincarnation.
Has to be within the main inventory to gain charges.

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally.

24 mana, 0.1 mana regeneration and 0.2% flat base magic resistance.
2 attack speed and 0.33 main armor.

abilities.name: Damage Block
abilities.description: Grants the wielder a chance to block a fixed portion of physical attack damage.
notes: Ranged wielders block less damage with the same proc chance
Uses pseudo-random distribution
When multiple different sources proc on the same attack, the one with a higher value takes priority
Multiple sources of the same value stack multiplicatively
Does not work against damage from wards sources
Does not reduce physical damage from abilities, except for specific abilities

additionalInfo: The proc chances of all sources of Damage Block work independently from each other
When multiple sources of Damage Block proc on the same attack, only the one with the highest blocked damage value takes effect
Can be disassembled
Effective to block the attack damage from summoned units and illusions (except from Chaos Knight Phantasm illusions which applies full damage and proc crit)
Especially useful with tanky frontline heroes that need to survive much damage
Less useful for heroes with high armor
Can be purchased over a lifesteal item to jungle with a melee hero
Because it is less effective in late game, it is often disassembled into a Heart of Tarrasque or Lotus Orb
On a melee hero with low amount of HP it can be more effective than magic resistance items to tank both spells and physical damages

Stacks additively with other sources of generic incoming damage manipulation

Shares a debuff with Arctic Blast, the last applied source overrides previous sources

notes: Only works with magical and physical spell damage

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.description: Sweeps the target up into a cyclone, applying a basic dispel, turning them invulnerable for a short while.
notes: Double-tapping automatically targets self
Applies a basic dispel and Cyclone effect on the target upon cast, turning it invulnerable and fully disabled
The Cyclone duration is not affected by status resistance
If cast on self, silences, mutes, and disarms the caster, instead of fully disabling them
Cyclone first applies the dispel, then the cyclone modifier

The damage is applied at the end of the duration. If the cyclone gets dispelled, it still applies the damage as soon as the target lands
The damage is only applied to enemy targets

35 main attack damage to Intelligence heroes

Purges first, then applies Cyclone modifier

abilities.description: Summons a number of Necronomicon Warriors and Necronomicon Archers that are under the caster's control, with strong attacks and several abilities of their own.
notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast

However, recasting it with a second Book of the Dead (stolen from the enemy or copied by a Tempest Double) creates new summons
The summons cannot be targeted by Helm of the Dominator or Helm of the Overlord, and the warrior cannot be targeted by Hand of Midas

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.

abilities.description: Regular attacks deal more damage to enemies for each instance of health they are missing.
notes: Works against any unit, including buildings, wards, and allies
Dark Mercy is considered as a conditional attack damage bonus
Although the attack damage bonus values are not displayed in the HUD, it is still considered and directly added to wielder's attack damage
The attack damage bonus values are not considered by critical strike and cleave
However, it is considered by lifesteal, and it can be reduced only by flat reductions (e.g. damage block)

abilities.description: Transforms into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after a delay, stunning enemies and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemy units for a while.
notes: Disjoints projectiles and teleports the caster upon cast
The meteor takes 1 second to land. During this period, the caster is invulnerable and hidden
Upon landing, all enemies within the area, including buildings but excluding wards, get damaged, stunned, and receive a damaging debuff
The meteor first applies the debuffs, then the impact damage

notes: The ability triggers upon reaching the attack point, not upon landing an attack

abilities.name: Death Delay
abilities.description: When receiving a killing blow, the death gets delayed for a short time, during which the wielder can still act freely.
notes: The wielder enters Death Delay when their health reaches 1, unless they are affected by Shallow Grave, Battle Trance, Wraith Delay, or have Reincarnation
The wielder is kept alive by having their minimum health set to 1. Damage taken is technically not reduced
Death Delay does not trigger for Meepo if one of his Meepo Clones get killed, instead of the prime Meepo who carries the item
Death Delay grants the wielder unobstructed movement, allowing them to move through units, trees, and over cliffs
During Death Delay, the wielder is still alive, so they are still fully targetable and affected by spells and attacks
Since the wielder did not die yet, buffs and debuffs are not dispelled either, like how they would upon death
When Death Delay expires, the wielder dies. The kill is credited to whoever triggered it
The wielder cannot be saved by any means. They will die once the effect expires, even if they are invulnerable, or anything that usually prevents death
If the wielder gains reincarnation during Death Delay, it still triggers regularly and reincarnates the wielder

abilities.name: Psychic Push
abilities.description: Pushes the target enemy unit away from you 400 distance.

The target is not disabled during the push, so they still can cast abilities, attack, and turn during the push
Does not interrupt channeling abilities upon cast
Does not push units affected by Black Hole, Chronosphere, Duel or Flaming Lasso
Cannot push units through Kinetic Field or Arena of Blood

abilities.name: Retribution
abilities.description: For the next few seconds, a portion of damage taken by the caster is reflected to the target unit as physical damage.
notes: Returns incoming damage before all manipulations. However, damage manipulation on the enemy still affects the damage normally.
Reflected physical damage is affected by damage block as well.
The returned damage is always dealt right after the incoming damage.
Returned damage has the no-reflection flag, preventing its damage from interacting with other sources of damage with the same flag.
Fully procs on-damage effects, except those which have a minimum damage threshold (e.g. Gravekeeper's Cloak).
The damage has the no-spell-lifesteal flag, preventing its damage from utilising spell lifesteal.
The damage has the no-spell-amplification flag, preventing its damage from being amplified with spell damage amplification.
Damage Return has a global range and affects units through the Fog of War or invisibility.
Fully stacks with Damage Return.
